main event: On 7 May 1949, two diamond-shaped unidentified aerial objects were observed over Camp Hood, Texas, with colors ranging from red to greenish-white.
interesting points: The first object was in sight for approximately 57 seconds and moved from northwest to southeast before fading out., The second object was observed for about 10 minutes and appeared to be stationary while slowly losing altitude., Binoculars were used to observe the second object, which was located in the west., Observations were made by military personnel during clear weather conditions., The phenomena included reports of multiple sightings by different observers in the vicinity of Camp Hood.
witness description: military observers, including officers and personnel from the 2nd Armored Division
